headline: The Trade Desk Announces Anders Mortensen as New Chief Revenue Officer
summary: VENTURA, Calif., October 28, 2025--The Trade Desk, the world’s leading independent advertising technology company, today announced the appointment of Anders Mortensen as Chief Revenue Officer (CRO), effective November 4th. Mortensen will be responsible for driving revenue generation globally, and will report to Jeff Green, The Trade Desk’s CEO and Co-Founder.
